name: Spoopy Crinkle Pony Demo
description:
I personally guarantee that this game will make you dump your pants in either fear or just because that's what you do in your spare time, if it doesn't that means your probably normal and you really shouldn't be looking into these strange parts of the internet. Also, you personally disgust me.

Are you brave enough to venture forth and discover all of the horrifying secrets this game holds?

This game is part of The brown box pack. The $6 tier also will net you all the game's cutscene art in a pack. It will turn into the full version on the 31st.
